entry.title: Setup Python Env for Emacs
entry.content:
安装 elpy

M-x package-install elpy

配置文件

lisp (elpy-enable) (add-hook 'elpy-mode-hook (lambda () (define-key elpy-mode-map (kbd "M-.") 'elpy-goto-definition) (define-key elpy-mode-map (kbd "C-x M-.") 'elpy-goto-definition-other-window) (define-key elpy-mode-map (kbd "M-,") 'pop-tag-mark) (define-key elpy-mode-map (kbd "M-RET") 'elpy-company-backend) ))

Happy Hacking
